replies.body:
I really hope Riot makes a chroma pack for SG Shyvanna. 

I'm buying it, in hopes that there's some good colors in the future. PLEEEAASE Riot!!!!
Uhh... It's a bit early for these I think.
Seriously - who is being sold on the 1st-2nd?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-0929-1002-0

Or, you know, open up the Store in game.
she doesn't need a rework, just plain buffing. I mained her since release and she's never felt this bad to play... just to break even against enemy's you have to be super ahead.
sale on kindred even though she's not viable anymore? riot????
Still a cool champion tho, even if they're not worth picking.
I believe so. I loved their character so much I saved up a lot of ip for them. It was so hard not to spend the ip on runes.  {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
Henlo rito.. am tahm main and was hoping he could get a good 1350 christmas skin this year, along with kandy kayn... thank you have niec day {{champion:223}} {{champion:141}}

Quick question. when do the skins go off sale? i know tomorrow on friday but does it count past midnight tonight when its technically friday, or will it be at a certain time. just curious lol. Sorry if the question sounds confusing :3
PLEASE make a way to get rp without buying it
PLEASE make Aurelion Sol on sale
